events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived the wrong size. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product size.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case regarding the incorrect jacket size.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with the return and refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 45823910. The jacket hasn’t been worn and the tags are still attached inside the packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will email you a prepaid return label shortly. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thanks for the quick response and clear instructions.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method shortly.
Just following up to confirm that your refund was received successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Thank you for contacting support. We are closing this case now but feel free to reach out anytime in the future.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
